title: Great Men of Science: A History of Scientific Progress
description: Philipp Eduard Anton von Lenard, was a German physicist and the winner of the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1905 for his research on cathode rays and the discovery of many of their properties: "Because it is the only legal tender in Nature, Truth must one day come into play among people; otherwise mankind will go down into decline in spite of all technology."
author: Philipp Lenard
